ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T20:57:28 [Issue ID 4000-46749] urn:comicvine:4000-46749
ComicInfo.Summary:
The are DV8! Bliss, Copycat, Evo, Frostbite, Powerhaus, Sublime and Threshold - writer Warren Ellis created this hardcore super teen team of anti-heroes as a counterpoint to the lighthearted young super hero teams so prevalent in comics!
DV8 settles down in New York City. The first mission is to bring back an alien from a C.I.A base.
*List of covers and their creators:* CoverNameCreator(s)Sidebar LocationRegRegular Cover (Team)Humberto Ramos (a) & Sal Regla (c)1VarVariant "Lust" Cover (Threshold)Kevin Nowlan2VarVariant "Wrath" Cover (Evo)Gaetano Liberatore3VarVariant "Sloth" Cover (Frostbite)Jim Lee4VarVariant "Pride" Cover (Copycat)Adam Hughes5VarVariant "Greed" Cover (Bliss)J. Scott Campbell & Alex Garner6VarVariant "Gluttony" Cover (Powerhouse)Glenn Fabry7VarVariant "Envy" Cover (Sublime)Michael Lopez & Edwin Rosell8
Note: This issue featured eight different covers by eight different artists. The main (regular) cover featured the DV8 team and was drawn by interior artists Ramos and Regla. The other seven (variant) covers feature the other members of DV8 and depicting the Seven Deadly Sins.
ComicInfo.Title: Lust for Life
